query.value: SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where tas:TextPropertyAC IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where tas:TextPropertyAC IS NULL
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where tas:TextPropertyAC='aspect content text subfile-1'
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where tas:TextPropertyAC LIKE 'aspect content text subfile-2'
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where tas:TextPropertyAC IN('aspect content text subfile-2', 'aspect content text file-1')
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where tas:TextPropertyAC <> 'aspect content text subfile-2'
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where tas:TextPropertyAC NOT IN('aspect content text subfile-2', 'aspect content text file-1')
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where tas:TextPropertyAC LIKE 'aspect content text%'
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where tas:IntPropertyAC = '81'
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where tas:IntPropertyAC <> '82'
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where tas:IntPropertyAC < '82'
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where tas:IntPropertyAC <= '82'
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where tas:IntPropertyAC >= '82'
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where tas:IntPropertyAC > '82'
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where tas:IntPropertyAC IN('80', '81', '83')
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where tas:IntPropertyAC NOT IN('80', '81', '83')
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where tas:TextPropertyAF IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where tas:TextPropertyAF IS NULL
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where tas:TextPropertyAF='aspect folder text subfolder-2'
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where tas:TextPropertyAF LIKE 'aspect folder text subfolder-1'
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where tas:TextPropertyAF IN('aspect folder text subfolder-1', 'aspect folder text folder1', 'aspect content text file-1')
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where tas:TextPropertyAF <> 'aspect folder text subfolder-1'
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where tas:TextPropertyAF NOT IN('aspect folder text subfolder-1', 'aspect folder text subfolder-2')
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where tas:TextPropertyAF LIKE 'aspect folder text subfolder%'
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where tas:IntPropertyAF = '11'
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where tas:IntPropertyAF <> '10'
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where tas:IntPropertyAF < '11'
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where tas:IntPropertyAF <= '11'
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where tas:IntPropertyAF >= '11'
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where tas:IntPropertyAF > '11'
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where tas:IntPropertyAF > '12'
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where tas:IntPropertyAF IN('11', '12', '13')
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where tas:IntPropertyAF NOT IN('11', '12', '83')
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[f1]')
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:name ASC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:name DESC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:lastModificationDate ASC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:lastModificationDate DESC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:createdBy DESC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:createdBy ASC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:name ASC, cmis:lastModifiedBy DESC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:name DESC, cmis:lastModifiedBy DESC
SELECT * FROM cm:dublincore where IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[f1]')
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[s1]')
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[f1]')
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:name ASC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:name DESC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:lastModificationDate ASC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:lastModificationDate DESC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:createdBy DESC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:createdBy ASC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:name ASC, cmis:lastModifiedBy DESC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:name DESC, cmis:lastModifiedBy DESC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_FOLDER('NODE_REF[s1]')
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where IN_TREE('NODE_REF[f1]')
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where IN_TREE('NODE_REF[s1]')
SELECT * FROM cm:dublincore where IN_TREE('NODE_REF[f1]')
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_TREE('NODE_REF[f1]')
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_TREE('NODE_REF[s1]')
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_TREE('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:name ASC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_TREE('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:name DESC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_TREE('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:lastModificationDate ASC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_TREE('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:lastModificationDate DESC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_TREE('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:createdBy DESC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_TREE('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:createdBy ASC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_TREE('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:name ASC, cmis:lastModifiedBy DESC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_TREE('NODE_REF[f1]') ORDER BY cmis:name DESC, cmis:lastModifiedBy DESC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_TREE('NODE_REF[s1]') ORDER BY cmis:name ASC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_TREE('NODE_REF[s1]') ORDER BY cmis:lastModificationDate ASC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_TREE('NODE_REF[s1]') ORDER BY cmis:createdBy ASC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasFolderAspect where IN_TREE('NODE_REF[s1]') ORDER BY cmis:name ASC, cmis:lastModifiedBy DESC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where IN_TREE('NODE_REF[s1]') ORDER BY cmis:name ASC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where IN_TREE('NODE_REF[s1]') ORDER BY cmis:lastModificationDate DESC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where IN_TREE('NODE_REF[s1]') ORDER BY cmis:createdBy DESC
SELECT * FROM tas:tasContentAspect where IN_TREE('NODE_REF[s1]') ORDER BY cmis:name ASC, cmis:lastModifiedBy DESC
SELECT D.*, O.* FROM cmis:document as D JOIN tas:tasContentAspect AS O ON D.cmis:objectId = O.cmis:objectId
SELECT D.*, O.* FROM cmis:document as D JOIN tas:tasContentAspect AS O ON D.cmis:objectId = O.cmis:objectId WHERE O.tas:TextPropertyAC ='aspect content text file-2'
SELECT D.*, O.* FROM cmis:document as D JOIN tas:tasContentAspect AS O ON D.cmis:objectId = O.cmis:objectId WHERE O.tas:TextPropertyAC LIKE 'aspect content text%'
SELECT D.*, O.* FROM cmis:document as D JOIN tas:tasContentAspect AS O ON D.cmis:objectId = O.cmis:objectId WHERE O.tas:IntPropertyAC IN('85', '84', '81', '83', '99') ORDER BY cmis:name ASC
SELECT D.*, O.* FROM tas:document as D JOIN tas:tasContentAspect AS O ON D.cmis:objectId = O.cmis:objectId
SELECT D.*, O.* FROM tas:document as D JOIN tas:tasContentAspect AS O ON D.cmis:objectId = O.cmis:objectId WHERE O.tas:TextPropertyAC ='aspect content text subfile-2'
SELECT D.*, O.* FROM tas:document as D JOIN tas:tasContentAspect AS O ON D.cmis:objectId = O.cmis:objectId WHERE O.tas:TextPropertyAC LIKE 'aspect content text%'
SELECT D.*, O.* FROM tas:document as D JOIN tas:tasContentAspect AS O ON D.cmis:objectId = O.cmis:objectId WHERE O.tas:IntPropertyAC IN('85', '84', '82') ORDER BY cmis:name ASC
SELECT D.*, O.* FROM tas:document as D JOIN tas:tasContentAspect AS O ON D.cmis:objectId = O.cmis:objectId WHERE O.tas:IntPropertyAC = '85' ORDER BY cmis:name ASC, cmis:lastModifiedBy DESC
SELECT F.*, O.* FROM cmis:folder as F JOIN tas:tasFolderAspect AS O ON F.cmis:objectId = O.cmis:objectId
SELECT F.*, O.* FROM cmis:folder as F JOIN tas:tasFolderAspect AS O ON F.cmis:objectId = O.cmis:objectId WHERE O.tas:TextPropertyAF ='aspect folder text subfolder-2'
SELECT F.*, O.* FROM cmis:folder as F JOIN tas:tasFolderAspect AS O ON F.cmis:objectId = O.cmis:objectId WHERE O.tas:TextPropertyAF LIKE 'aspect folder text%'
SELECT F.*, O.* FROM cmis:folder as F JOIN tas:tasFolderAspect AS O ON F.cmis:objectId = O.cmis:objectId WHERE O.tas:IntPropertyAF IN('10', '11', '12', '83', '99') ORDER BY cmis:name ASC
SELECT F.*, O.* FROM tas:folder as F JOIN tas:tasFolderAspect AS O ON F.cmis:objectId = O.cmis:objectId
SELECT F.*, O.* FROM tas:folder as F JOIN tas:tasFolderAspect AS O ON F.cmis:objectId = O.cmis:objectId WHERE O.tas:TextPropertyAF ='aspect folder text subfolder-1'
SELECT F.*, O.* FROM tas:folder as F JOIN tas:tasFolderAspect AS O ON F.cmis:objectId = O.cmis:objectId WHERE O.tas:TextPropertyAF LIKE 'aspect folder%'
SELECT F.*, O.* FROM tas:folder as F JOIN tas:tasFolderAspect AS O ON F.cmis:objectId = O.cmis:objectId WHERE O.tas:IntPropertyAF IN('10', '11', '12') ORDER BY cmis:name ASC, cmis:lastModifiedBy DESC
SELECT F.*, O.* FROM tas:folder as F JOIN tas:tasFolderAspect AS O ON F.cmis:objectId = O.cmis:objectId WHERE O.tas:IntPropertyAF = '12' ORDER BY cmis:name ASC, cmis:lastModifiedBy DESC
